    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SettingsSingleton getInstance()
        Rather than creating a constructor for this singleton Settings class, we access the single instance of the Settings object through this method and edit/retrieve our settings values that way.
        Returns:
        a SettingsSingleton instance.
